1.content:
"Gaaaaah I'm so board!" said Fry from the couch in the Planet Express building. "Theres nothing going on, and nothing good on TV!"

"I know what you mean!" Leela added, "And the Professor's been locked away in his lab for days, working on something! We've had no deliveries because of this, for about 3 weeks!"

The door opened and Bender walked in.

"Hey, whats up meatbags?" Bender asked

"Nothing, just another day of nothing good going on!" Leela replied

The group heard loud screaming and banging noises coming from the laboratory before the door opened again to reveal Amy and the Professor wearing tattered clothes, covered in soot, probably from an explosion in the lab.

"Good news everyone!" he began, "After several weeks, and with Amy's assistance, I have successfully perfected my What If machine! It can now predict what would happen to an accuracy of 1/1000000000000th of a plausibility unit!"

The group gasped

"Thats so plausible I cant imagine it!"

The Professor wheeled in the device and the group gathered round.

"Now gather round friends and lets take her for a spin. Who wants to go first?"

info.brief_description: The Planet Express Crew delve once more into the power of the What If Machine.
info.description:
The Planet Express Crew delve once more into the power of the What If Machine. Who's question will be asked today? You decide.
